title: DirectX error
body: So I was playing other games all day then wanted to play League so I hopped on and now I can't connect because it says DirectX error and to make sure my video cards have their drivers updated tf do I do?

replies.body: It'd be good to first check that you've got the latest [**graphics drivers**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq1) for your graphics card, but also check that you've updated DirectX drivers as well.

Have you tried rebooting your operating system?

A service could have crashed and turned off while playing another game, give it a shot and see if that fixes your issue.
